arStrings.szText: Thanks For Playing!

Welcome to the server slam!

Pre-purchase the {u}Ultimate Edition{/u}
and get up to 4 days Early Access* at Launch

*Up to 4 days based on estimated access, actual play time subject to possible outages and applicable time zone differences.
©2023 Blizzard Entertainment, Inc.
Pre-Order {icon:ExternalLink_Simple, 2.0}
Fight back demonic hordes, uncover the immersive story, and explore Sanctuary {b}up to level 20! {/b}
{b}Purchase Diablo IV{/b} to experience the full campaign, mightier challenges, new seasons, and more. Plus, your trial progress will carry over!
Will you continue to brave the darkness and become the hero Sanctuary needs? Battle onward to Level 20 in this free trial!
Enjoying your slay through Sanctuary? {b}Purchase Diablo IV now{/b} and keep your trial progress.
Greetings, wanderer! Welcome to the {b}Diablo IV free trial.{/b}
Congratulations! You completed Act I.
Lilith’s grip tightens on the townsfolk of Sanctuary! Don’t let your progress go for naught. Continue your stand against these diabolical forces - {b}purchase Diablo IV now!{/b}
New events, stories, seasons, rewards, and more are looming on the horizon!

Free Trial Max Level Reached. 
{b}Thank you for playing!{/b}
Buy Now {icon:ExternalLinkIcon_Simple, 1}
You are nearing the end of our free trial level cap of {s1}.
You have reached the level cap of our free trial and will be returned to Character Select in {s1}|4minute:minutes. Thank you for playing!
